name: 東南亞文化與歷史概略
description: This is an introductory course on the history and culture of Southeast Asia. The aim of the course is to expand students’ understanding of Southeast Asia, exploring topics ranging from early kingdoms to some current issues faced by different southeast Asian countries. By the end of the course, students should have constructed a general understanding of Southeast Asia, be aware of the major similarities and differences among Southeast Asian countries, and have a better grasp of the varied and rich cultures of Southeast Asia.
goals: 習得東南亞文化、歷史概略
經由主題討論、歷史事件解析與同儕合作學習
syllabus:
This is an introductory course on the history and culture of Southeast Asia. The aim of the course is to expand students' understanding of Southeast Asia, exploring topics ranging from early kingdoms to some current issues faced by different Southeast Asian countries. By the end of the course, students should have constructed a general understanding of Southeast Asia, be aware of the major similarities and differences among Southeast Asian countries, and have a better grasp of the varied and rich cultures of Southeast Asia.

The course will be conducted entirely in English. Students will be required to participate in classroom discussions in English.

選擇本課程的學生**應有優良的英語能力**（即能夠閱讀大學程度學術英語文獻、能與英語母語者自然、流暢且無障礙地溝通、討論）。英語程度不符前述的同學請慎重考慮。
